name: endure (itch) (VintageBiscuits)
description:
Controls:

WASD - move

touch the bullets while stopped to increase your score, touch them while moving and die, every time you stop you have a countdown until you die so you must keep moving

made in around 5 hours for the Mini Jam 97. the game must have the limitation that movement is lethal, so this Idea popped into my head of only being able to survive damage by not moving.

the story didn't make it into the game but i might add it later down the line, essentially this is your eternal punishment, you must be moving at all times however the only way to endure the bullets being hurled at you is to stop moving.

currently in the game there are 4 death animations with one standard and 3 hidden, the 3 have a random chance of spawning after every death.
